answers.answer: They should be sending you in to do the glucose test any time now.
U should be getting a gestational diabetes test soon I got it at 25 weeks

That's what I thought I have a appointment this Thursday and I called and asked my doctor if I was getting any testing done she just said no its a regular check up and then I would see her again In another month

question: So I'm just wondering I'm 26 weeks and I haven't been tested for anything or had any blodd work since I was 16 weeks is that normal??? This is my first baby so idk if I should say something to my doctor or not
title: Testing question
